mapper.select: select major_id, id, password, name, gender, birth1, birth2, birth3, reg_date, tel1, tel2, tel3, zipcode, addr1, addr2, is_block from users where id = #{id}

SELECT q.qna_id seq, q.subject subject,to_char(q.reg_date, 'yyyy/mm/dd') reg_date, q.category from qna q where q.user_id = #{user_id} union SELECT mn.myroom_next_id seq, mn.subject subject,to_char(mn.reg_date, 'yyyy/mm/dd') reg_date, mn.category from myroom_next mn WHERE mn.user_id = #{user_id} union select qc.qna_comment_id seq, qc.qna_subject, to_char(qc.reg_date, 'yyyy/mm/dd') reg_date, qc.category from qna_comment qc where qc.user_id = #{user_id} order by reg_date desc
select group_id groupId from grouproom_list where is_accept = 1 and user_id = #{user_id}
select group_id, group_name from grouproom where group_id = (select gh.group_id from grouproom_hw gh, schedule sc where gh.schedule_id = sc.schedule_id and myroom_next_id = #{seq})
